meanings: (목숨을) kill, take sb's life, (살해하다) murder, (informal) knock sb off, (신문·문학 용어) slay, (학살하다) slaughter, butcher, ...
Verb bring down, make something blunt
미술 St. George Killing the Dragon

vlive.korean: 이거? - 이거 죽이는 거야 이거 죽이는 거야? This? - What's kill? Thumb up or down? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “환상의 대똥촉파티(Feat. 마피아게임)” (갓세븐 : GOT7)
vlive.english: This? - What's kill? Thumb up or down?

vlive.korean: [장난] 나 죽이는 거 담당인 거 알지? [Joking] Do you know that I always kill something? 듣기 View video 잼플리 Jamfully : 23살 남자들의 현실적인 첫 데이트 고민 💗광대주의💗 [썸타는 일주일] - EP.01
vlive.english: [Joking] Do you know that I always kill something?

vlive.korean: 투표가 아니라 이거 - 아 이거 하고 죽이는 거 안했다 우리! This is not vote. - We did this but we didn't kill this! 듣기 View video GFRIEND : M6😁
vlive.english: This is not vote. - We did this but we didn't kill this!

vlive.korean: 색깔을 일부러 죽이는 거죠. so I'm going to kill the color. 듣기 View video HOONION : [Challenge] 화알못친구에게 안젤리나졸리 메이크업을 받아본다면? makeup challenge
vlive.english: so I'm going to kill the color.

vlive.english: What do you call killing bugs?
